resources.string: What is the value of your like?
Every day people spend their spare time in social networks from 1 up to 6 hours. The bigger part of this time they spend liking other people photos.
What are these infinite likes? The most important question is: what is the benefit for you and others of these likes?
At GOODWILL everyone simply can help homeless animals by liking.
CHOOSE THE VALUE OF YOUR LIKE
LIKE EVERYTHING YOU ARE EAGER TO PURCHASE FOR ANIMALS * You can buy products by yourself or with your friend
PAY WITH YOUR CARD VIA GOOGLE PAY *The remaining funds are automatically transferred to the general needs of shelter
WEEKLY RECEIVE A REPORT ABOUT YOUR HELP
DON\'T SAVE THE DOGS. SAVE HUMAN.\nIN YOURSELF.
A STORY THAT DOES NOT LEAVE ANYBODY
" IS IN THE PAST, WHEN THERE HAS BEEN 60 YEARS OF TORTURING ANIMALS"
THE FIRST INCOME OF $ 10,000 WAS MADE BY BRIZHIT BORDO
THERE ARE MUCH NON-BUSINESS PEOPLE. ARE WE, UKRAINIANS, APATHETIC?
How many tailed friends recovered? How many dogs and cats have you fed? How many fluffies have found their home?
ENTER THE AMOUNT YOU WANT TO DONATE
LOOK REPORT IN YOUR PERSONAL ACCOUNT
Sorry you dont have internet connection!\\n Please connect to internet and open GOODWILL again.

Hi! My name is Palkan, I am a courageous and at the same time gentle guy. I am about 4–5 years old. I dream of a family and a house that I can adequately protect. In the meantime, my owner is looking for me, sometimes I miss. However, I have many friends, so the time for sadness is not enough.

Hello! My name is Sultan. I\'m about 3–4 years old. I do not know why they called me that. As for me, I do not look like a sultan at all. Perhaps because I, like a real man, everywhere I feel most important?

Hi! My name is Svetka. I have such a popular Ukrainian name so that everyone can easily remember. I do not know how old I am, but in my heart I always remain a little girl. And yet, all the girls envy me through my eyes. Do you see how well they summed up little black?
Hey there! I\'m still quite small and I have no name yet. But it\'s cool, because you can call me to your taste. I have a little nose, and also beautiful eyes. Let\'s be friends?

Hi! I really like to play hide and seek. I tried to hide from the camera, but for some reason they found me so quickly. I\'m still quite small and I have no name yet, but I am very soft and kind. Perhaps, I am your future friend?

Good time of the day! I love to be photographed. From this photo shoot I have sooo many photos. If you like to be photographed for social networks - we already have something that unites with you. Below you can meet my sister, she is more shy.
Hi! I am a girl and I want to handle. Although I am still quite small, but I already know how to be friends sincerely. Perhaps you are my friend?

Hey! I do not have a name, but I often hear in my address such words - “fluffy”, “lohmastik.” At first, I was embarrassed about my fluffiness, but now I realized that this was my peculiarity. I am a very dedicated dog. I welcome all the guests of the shelter, and then accompany them to the car itself.
Hi! I am very playful and cheerful dog. Three more puppies live in the shelter with me. We are a gang, which with joy and love meets everyone who comes to visit us.
Hi! If you are looking for such a beautiful cat like me, tips for our acquaintance! I do not know how old I am, but I\'m still that tough nut.
- a world where your likes and time spent on them will finally be useful
We understood that help should be targeted and understandable to all. So we came up with help curses, because the speech likes today is clear to everyone.
GOODWILL is a socially responsible initiative, which aims to house the homeless animals to always be fed and in heat.
"- go to address, city Kyiv Pyrogivsky shlah st., 186 "
You can always change like cost in your Profile
